Reference

All functions

bpbounds_from_data()

Wrapper of bpbounds::bpbounds

create_script()

Create Polymake Script

create_vertices()

Create vertices for polymake program

from_simulated_to_dag()

Create tidy DAG from simulation

gammas_from_tabp()

Calculate gammas from joint conditionals

get_bounds()

Function to return ACE bounds from P(X = 1 | Z), P(Y = 1 | Z), or P(X,Y | Z).

joint_from_marginal()

P(X,Y|Z) from P(X|Z), P(Y|Z), and Cov(X,Y|Z)

marginals_from_logit()

Get P(X = 1 | Z_j), P(X) from a specified logistic model

perform_transformation()

Function to transform etas and deltas to gammas and thetas

plot_DAG()

Plot DAG from simulation

plot_valid_covs()

Plot valid covs

potential_covs()

Valid range of Covs

probs_from_data()

Calculate gammas/thetas/zetas from full data

rbivNorm()

Simulate dependent categorical variables

read_polymake_results()

Read output from polymake

sample_joint_probs()

Sample valid distributions P(X,Y|Z)

simulate_data()

Simulate data from IV model

thetas_from_tabp()

Calculate thetas from joint conditionals

tidy_bpbounds()

Tidy up output from bpbounds
